Issue.creator: caod
Issue.description: Currently the coordinator forms the block, passes it to the txvalidator, receives it back, stores it and then passes it off to CommitWithPvtData which runs through the kvledger validation/commit flow (mvcc validation, etc). Following the proposed refactor in https://docs.google.com/document/d/1BBVA8u-GJ99ZYRT015PAnMVK4_pKv53Y-kiP9lZX8Gc/edit# the coordinator should move private data collection to the new dependencies PrivateDataProvider and consolidate logic to pass the block once to Commit instead of CommitWithPrvData. This work also includes implementing the BlockProcessor that creates a TxProcessor instance per tx from the TxProcessorFactory
